R

RandomEvent - Class in backend
Implements random events that occur when a day is transitioned
RandomEvent() - Constructor for class backend.RandomEvent
Causes an error if someone tries to create an instance of this class
RandomEventOutput - Class in backend
Contains a random event that occurred and the crew member involved Should only be used by the RandomEvent class
RandomEventOutput(RandomEventTypes, CrewMember) - Constructor for class backend.RandomEventOutput
Constructs a RandomEventOutput with a given event and crew member
RandomEventTest - Class in backendTesting
Junit tests for random events

RandomEventTypes - Enum in backend
Contains the possible random events that may occur on a day transition
RandomEventTypes() - Constructor for enum backend.RandomEventTypes
 
readyCrew - Variable in class graphicalInterface.MainScreen
 
reduceTiredness(int) - Method in class backend.CrewMember
Reduces the crew members tiredness by a given amount

removeSpacePlague() - Method in class backend.CrewMember
Sets the crew members space plague flag to false
repairShields() - Method in class backend.CrewMember
Repairs the ships shields by 50 if the crew member is an engineer, other wise repairs the ships shields by 25 Decreases the crew members action points by 1
repairShields(int) - Static method in class backend.Ship
Method to repair the shields on the ship
